title: Spiralised courgette with red pepper and tomatoes
ingredients: ['1 courgette, or more to taste', '1 teaspoon salt, or as needed', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 small onion, thinly sliced lengthwise', '1/2 red or yellow pepper, cut into matchstick-sized pieces', '150g red or yellow cherry tomatoes', '1/2 teaspoon garlic powder', '2 tablespoons milk, or more to taste', '120g grated pecorino cheese', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano']
